Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1060.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yuka Saotome?', 3: 'Yata, are you really leaving?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome?', 3: 'Where are you running off to, leaving me here all alone?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome?', 3: 'I worked so hard to build a proper school life for you...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome?', 3: "You don't like it? Not up to your standards?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome?', 3: "Don't worry. Next time I'll shape the dream exactly how you like it.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: "This isn't our school anymore... It's nothing but a graveyard!", 4: '18'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome?', 3: "What's wrong with drifting eternally through memories of days gone by?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome?', 3: "To live forever without pain... Isn't life just a fleeting dream anyway?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome?', 3: 'Why wake up at all? Are all our problems just gonna go away when we wake up?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'I remember now... I remember everything now.', 4: '18'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome?', 3: "You're only going to find yourself in greater pain the more you think, Yata...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "I came here for one thing—to deal with the Red Tide's influence on this island.", 4: '18'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "These illusions you're projecting... they're meant to hold me back. You've been trying to stop me all along.", 4: '18'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'For me... no, for all of humanity, you stand as our enemy.', 4: '18'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Yuka, tell me now! Where did you take Shiva?!', 4: '18'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome?', 3: 'Is that person important to you?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "She's my companion, my comrade-in-arms who fought beside me.", 4: '18'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome?', 3: 'Does that make you two... friends?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Friends? Yeah, I guess you could say that.', 4: '18'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome?', 3: "She's your friend... and I'm not?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Are we seriously having this argument right now?!', 4: '18'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome?', 3: 'I never really wanted things to turn out like this, but...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome?', 3: "Why... We could have gone to the Red Tide's world together.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome?', 3: "Don't worry, I'll help you remember everything... slowly.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStorySugorokuScreen02.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: 'After failing to persuade her, "Yuka\'s" body begins to twist and contort before Yata\'s eyes.'}
{3: 'Soon, beneath the black hair, her delicate features begin to blur and melt away like liquid.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: "You're not Yuka. You're just some kind of illusion.", 4: '18'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "Wait, Yuka! Don't choose that side!", 4: '18'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "Don't choose the Red Tide!", 4: '18'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome?', 3: 'Heh...'}
{3: "Before Yata's eyes, Yuka dissolves into a puddle of red liquid and vanishes into the classroom floor."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: "We're in an illusion. Figured as much.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Like a dream, the moment you become aware of it, everything begins to crumble and fall apart.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStorySugorokuScreen02.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryBianHong.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront18.png', 4: '4'}
{3: 'The "reality" around the classroom begins to unravel as red liquid seeps through the walls from all sides.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryMovieFilm.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'The ground trembles continuously as waves of static and flashing lights surge through the air.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryBianHong.prefab'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBeginHei.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1055.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBeginHei.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1063.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBeginHei.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1057.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBeginHei.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1052.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBeginHei.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1060.jpg'}
{3: "The illusory space, the false objects, and Yata's perception of reality begin to contradict one another..."}
{3: 'Soon, the disintegration inches closer to where Yata stands...'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryMovieFilm.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFrontNewCommon23.png', 4: '4'}
{3: 'Spider-web-like cracks spread across the floor...'}
{3: 'Before the cracks reach her, Yata spins around and grabs the classroom door handle.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: 'Time to get out of here!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Yata turns the handle and pushes the door with all her might, and in that moment...'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBeginHei.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory538.png'}
{3: 'The world around her shatters like a jigsaw puzzle hitting the ground, breaking into fragments until only endless darkness remains.'}
{3: 'Before Yata lies a single dark path forward—there is no other way to go.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryGlow.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'She sprints down the path, where a white light gleams from an exit up ahead.'}
{3: 'Just before reaching the exit, a sudden curiosity stirs within Yata.'}
{3: 'Like in all myths, she cannot help but look back over her shoulder...'}
{3: 'Mere inches away, a massive Noh mask hurtles toward Yata, its maw gaping wide.'}
{3: 'As monstrous teeth threaten to devour everything in sight, the white-lit exit beckons just ahead.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryGlow.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png'}
{3: 'She lunges forward with all her might... and then, white light engulfs everything in sight.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1062.jpg'}
{3: "Yata's eyes snap wide open as she awakens in an unfamiliar place, gripped by fear and panic."}
{3: 'Her breath comes in uncontrolled gasps as the aftershocks of the vision still course through her.'}
{3: 'For Yata, now a Construct, these sensations are nothing but phantom pains, echoes of the person she was from when she was still a human.'}
{3: 'After regaining her composure, Yata surveys her surroundings—dust-covered audio equipment lies scattered nearby.'}
{3: 'Yata steadies herself against the soundproof wall as she rises, carefully listening for any movement nearby.'}
{3: "She appears to be in a school's broadcasting room."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: 'That diary I saw in the hallucination just now...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'I think it said something about a weird machine hidden in the activity room.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: 'Why would something like that be in a school, though? What exactly was the administration hiding?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "I wonder if that has anything to do with what's going on in this building now...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "I feel like I've forgotten something important.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "Wait, that's it—the mass fainting incident at Misono High!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'It happened... in the activity room... Yes, it happened in the activity room, too!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'I gotta look into this.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Yata pushes open the door to the broadcasting room and heads straight for the activity room.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1071.jpg'}
{3: 'As she climbs the stairs, her head starts throbbing again.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: 'The hallucinations are back...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Each step feels heavier than the last, but Yata grits her teeth through the discomfort and presses on.'}
{3: "By the time she staggers to the activity room, she's barely pulling herself together..."}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Almost there...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Just... have to make it... to the activity room...', 4: '1'}
{1: 'RImgBg1BlowUp'}
{3: 'Through sheer force of will, Yata continues to push forward.'}
{3: 'Soon, strange sounds reach her ears as visions from yesterday—the people, events, and scenes—begin to materialize.'}
{3: 'The abandoned corridor begins to twist and warp as strange lights and shadows dance once again.'}
{3: "Dead memories spring back to life and dance vividly before Yata's eyes as the illusions swallow her whole."}
